item.title: JavaScript This Explained
item.description: Learn this in Javascript There are four rules that help us determining the this object. The order of the rule matters. If your coming from an OOP language like Java or C# you most likely be confused about this dynamic beeing of this in JavaScript. Lets demistify it a bit. 1. Function is called with new if (isAwesome){ return true } 2. Function is called with apply / call 3.
